description: This file defines an extension 'NoteTimeExt' on the 'Note' class, providing formatted timestamp getters such as 'createdShort', 'updatedShort', 'createdFull', 'updatedFull', and 'updatedRelative'. These getters utilize utility functions from 'DateFormatUtils' to format the 'createdAt' and 'updatedAt' timestamps of notes.

classes.name: NoteTimeExt
classes.description: Extension providing formatted date strings for 'Note' timestamps.

methods.name: createdShort
methods.description: Returns the 'createdAt' timestamp formatted as a short date string.

methods.name: updatedShort
methods.description: Returns the 'updatedAt' timestamp formatted as a short date string.

methods.name: createdFull
methods.description: Returns the 'createdAt' timestamp formatted as a full date and time string.

methods.name: updatedFull
methods.description: Returns the 'updatedAt' timestamp formatted as a full date and time string.

methods.name: updatedRelative
methods.description: Returns the 'updatedAt' timestamp formatted as a relative time string (e.g., '3 days ago').
